events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team is reviewing your credentials with great interest.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on the software engineer role you applied for.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be your point of contact going forward.
We have conducted the initial screening interview for your software engineer application to assess your basic qualifications and experience.
Thank you for your prompt response to our initial screening questions and for sharing more about your background and skills.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior software engineer. Please prepare to discuss your coding experience in detail.
You completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and proficiency in key development technologies.
We have scheduled an HR interview to discuss your fit with the company culture and employment terms in more detail.
Your HR interview was completed where you shared your career aspirations and alignment with our organizational values.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role reflecting your skills and experience discussed in previous interviews.
You have accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you as a new member of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun. We are preparing all resources and training materials to help you integrate smoothly into our engineering department.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We are thrilled to have you joining us and look forward to your contributions as an engineer.
